comment: I took his class because his reviews on this website are great and I was not disappointed. As long as you actually try you will do great. Prof. Kirk gives great feedback and the way homework is laid out makes it easy to keep up with. He is very understanding if you have got a lot going on in life.

All homework is online and super easy, tests were front and back (not over the vocab just the grammar components of each chapter), group projects of talking, have to attend two cultural events on campus, extra credit if you sit at the Foreign Language department, lectures are fun and interactive, super funny and overall fun class. Highly recommend

Profe Kirk is an outstanding man. He's got a good sense of humor and is easy to listen to. I do well in Spanish, so I didn't study too much. As long as you do the online homework assignments and keep up with the textbook chapters, you can make an A in the class.

Best introductory Spanish instructor I've ever had. He's always willing to help, upbeat and knowledgeable. If you're 'iffy' about taking Spanish, but willing to be open and do the work - this is the class for you!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Would take again

comment: Profe Kirk was awesome. Simply as that. He was the most understanding professor I have had, and he makes being involved in his class easy. The involvement really helped me learn, and I appreciate that. I also messed up and missed a few online deadlines, and he extended them multiple times for me. Take him if you are going to take Spanish 1

One of the best professors I have ever had. His teaching is very clear and easy to understand. He honestly cares about his students and wants them to do well. Has a great sense of humor. Will not make you feel stupid for not knowing a part of the lesson. I highly suggest him.
